Articles.Content: mabye the thing about it being short for a shade of geen...... wait......... GREEN IRON CROWN INTEGRATION CONFIRMED!!? (jks)
I for one welcome our new reptilian Kerbal overlords.

You're all thinking about it the wrong way.

Flip a V upside down, you get a ^ (more or less)

And that's the shape people's rockets will have to use after the aero update.

They'll have to be pointy.

Illuminati confirmed.
It's probably an entire new game. V for Vehicle. Now you can build not only rockets and jet planes, but high performance cars, ships, submarines, bikes, helicopters, balloons...
Maybe it's Volkswagon, , , Oh no, that's a bug!
flying volkswagons confirmed

Maybe it's Volkswagon, , , Oh no, that's a bug!

And it runs and runs... hard to kill that bug...

Maybe its V for... volumetric clouds

or V for very secret?
I still think its got to do with Delta-Vee. I hope we get an announcement soon.

UNITY 5!!!!!

....I hope

(Probably just preparation to port it over if so though, not actually porting since U5 is still in beta)
Valentina?

"Project V"?

Perhaps it is short for Vall?

THAT would be extraordinarily interesting.

Project - Vogon

We will be able to destroy planets once we have a few crafts in orbit... to make room for a hyperspace highway to other celestial bodies.

Well, in real lift equations, lift is proportional to V^2. In current stock aero, it's with V alone.

Theyre giving us our second V.

I dunno. What's MaxMaps' area of responsibility again?

Valentina?

Surprisingly, you might be on to something: Maxmaps has stated in the past that female Kerbals are a distinct possibility, so V for Valentina, the first female astronaut, would fit quite well.

Maxmaps is probably laughing his head off at the wild speculation he's seeing right now, but this is pretty compelling.

Surprisingly, you might be on to something: Maxmaps has stated in the past that female Kerbals are a distinct possibility, so V for Valentina, the first female astronaut, would fit quite well.

Maxmaps is probably laughing his head off at the wild speculation he's seeing right now, but this is pretty compelling.

Well, than again V could be Vladislav Volkov .. a cosmonaut who died on Reentry.

May that be a hint that we get reentry heat now with the aero overhaul?

Well, than again V could be Vladislav Volkov .. a cosmonaut who died on Reentry.

May that be a hint that we get reentry heat now with the aero overhaul?

I feel it's a little tenuous, but I want reentry heat in stock so bad I'll believe it!!!
Yet another idea. A V formation is a way multiple planes can fly. So something to do with multiple vessels. Maybe controlling them all yourself, maybe it's multiplayer?
It's not the letter v, it's the roman number 5 (I II III IV V) for Unity 5 (And yes I'm a dreamer)

It's not the letter v, it's the roman number 5 (I II III IV V) for Unity 5 (And yes I'm a dreamer)

Max confirmed it's Vee, not Roman 5.
I'll make a list of all of the theories.
What if "V" is for "versus"? Maybe Max will show us details about a "space race" mode in multiplayer.

V = Vehicle

I guess parts get an overhaul. They deserve that.

V in spain is written "Uve".

It has 3 characters.

A triangle has 3 sides.

Project has 7 characters

7 is the lowest dimension of an exotic sphere

An eyeball is a sphere, but a very exotic one.

Jokes aside, it might be related to aerodynamics. (You know, an inverted V is a nose cone )

Maybe its something related with spanish, like "volar" which means "fly".

Anyway, who knows, hope it's something cool we don't have already in mods (*surface stuff*)

Cheers!
